tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had my wisdom teeth removed and Invisalign done from Dental Life, highly recommend it! Prices were reasonable and have had no issues so far. Wait time is low as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dental Life is a truly exceptional dental care center! From the moment I walked in, the staff was warm and welcoming, making me feel at ease. The facility is modern and clean, creating a pleasant atmosphere. The dental professionals are highly skilled and knowledgeable, patiently addressing all my concerns. Their advanced technology and state-of-the-art equipment impressed me. The treatment I received was top-notch, and they emphasized preventive care, which I appreciated. I left Dental Life feeling confident in my dental health and knowing I had found a center I can trust. I highly recommend them for anyone seeking top-quality dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have seen many dentists ,always in a hurry and not giving enough time to the patients.. but Dr. Mahima ma'am is different , she listens to the problem very patiently and has a better understanding in comparison to others ..in fact once I had a appointment with MAMC dentist ..so she was in a hurry , annoyed and was not patient about listening to things... I felt wierd but when I met Dr. Mahima ma'am my POV towards dentists totally changed..üôÇ. I remember Dr. Mahima said in one of her interviews that sh is very passionate about her work and looks forward to learn something new every single day.. and I have seen other ppl as well commending on her work..
I am very satisfied by her service that she is providing us...
Thank you so much ma'am üôè
reply_text:
Kashvi you have such a beautiful heart. Thank you so much for you kind words. It is truly my pleasure to strive towards giving you the best smile ever. 
My heartfelt gratitude towards you. 
Regards 
Dr. Mahima Nanda

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Mahima is an expert doctor for her knowledge of subject & latest treatment methods, friendly & advices & performs to the best of your satisfaction.
She is open minded and pursue you towards the right direction if your treatment is longish. 
Apart from dentist for all age groups, She specialises in Paediatric dentistry too & has a positive outlook, way of dealing with children & keeping them motivated. 
I consulted for my daughter‚Äôs braces & associated for almost 4 years now, found her & her team very co-operative & happy for my decision of choosing her. Also, for surgeries she will provide you with the right surgeon & you‚Äôll have a best exp.
Also, i will recommend her for one of the best dentist in city 
Thanks Mahima & team‚Ä¶thumbs up üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a really good experience for me personally. 
I had been in constant pain for the past 2 years. With Dr. Mahima & Dr. Shalini's assistance and guidance the root canal went quite smoothly. They did not give me any false assurance and we're upfront with their pricing and their treatment. I would definitely recommend Dental Life Gurgaon.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Mahima is a thorough professional who knows and understands exactly the treatment approach that is best suited  for a patient. For orthodontic alignment needs to literally see the future, and Dr. Mahima aces it !!!
In my case, I had to put the braces and stay abroad fr about 6 months. I had my hesitations, but Dr. Mahima assured me that it very manageable. I sent her pictures from time to to time and she gave her feedback and suggestions.
Now, I am back and find that almost 75% of the correction is already done !!! That is more than what I hoped for, and I never had to visit a doctor when I was abroad.
Dr. Mahima is always accessible and is very helpful in organising urgent appointments.
Also, Dr. Mahima and her staff are incredibly efficient, warm and welcoming !!!
Finally, in my opinion you can confidently approach Dr. Mahima for all your dental issues and be assured of a perfect treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've had a really good experience at Dental Life on my visits so far. Dr. Mahima is a very kind & patient human being who listens to her patients empathetically. Clinic is equipped with all modern facilities and is managed by very well-behaved assistants & staff members. I would definitely recommend this place.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr. Mahima and her team to get orthodontic treatment. My treatment started couple of months ago and I have already started to see the changes. The best thing about their clinic is that unlike other places Dr. Mahima is herself an Orthodontist. So there is no visiting doctor and she is always available to help me with all my braces related issues. I am looking forward to seeing the final results of my smile. I highly recommend this clinic for excellent dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Post and Core,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Examinations,
review:
Dr. Kapoor was very professional and she explained the process very well. She made a very good schedule to do the treatment. She provided very professional specialists for the treatmentes. The treatments were done on schedule. 
Dr. Kapoor, and her assistant Dr. Shalini and Dr. Mritunjay were very kind, gentle, friendly and understanding. 
I was very happy to choose her clinic for my treatment.
I do  recommend her very strongly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had my Root Canal Treatment/Tooth extraction and Crowning done by Dr. Mahima Nanda Kapoor of DENTAL LIFE. The whole procedure was done in a very professional manner without any discomfort. Dr. Mahima is an excellent Dentist , courteous and with positive attitude. Infact Dental life is staffed by highly qualified professionals, have world class technology equipment and maintain excellent hygiene.
I would have no hesitation in recommending them for any dental problems.

review: In these corona times.. Dr mahima has equipped her clinic in best way to deal with the crisis..She generally takes one patient at a time. Fumigation with peroxide is done after every patient.. Ppe kit is used on every patient. And her treatment protocol suits every patient according to the issues. She is cirdial to talk to.. And explains everything nicely. Highy recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Mahima Nanda for Dental Veneers and thanks to her I have a brand new smile. My chipped front teeth that had been bothering me for many years are now perfect. Thank you so much doctor. Thanks to your skilled work I can smile more confidently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Mahima is a dentist with a golden touch. She knows her subject but most importantly she also knows how to comfort the patients with her smile and attitude - loads of empathy for the patients in pain. 

She has a fantastic network of specialists who assist her in performing various treatments (read as magic!)

I would highly recommend her as she has been treating my family for a long time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mahima has been our family dental dr since we reached Gurgaon in 2011. She has been prompt *** **** ************* ** *** ****** Her expertise has no words for expressing. Infact my Son Gaurav had the metal bracing done and let me appreciate that she could fix the teeth alignment with min no of tooth removal (lesser than our other reference), while Gaurav friends has lot of issues when they have undergone the similar treatment with other DR but Gaurav has always been very appreciative of the smoothness of the entire process. Thanks Dr. Mahima to make our experience memorable and we assure you to be your patient till our stint here in Gurgaon

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Routine crown after RCT became a big issue- *** ** *** *********** **** ** ****** Dr Mahima wasn't present for impression & final fitting- very disappointing as I read her good feedbacks & not her assistant's on practo before booking an appointment with her. Eventually,  all the time & effort was unproductive, have got it re-done from a Prosthodontist. Dr Mahima has refunded the crown money since I didnt have faith to go back to her  for re-doing the process. Doctors esp whose name is on the clinic door need to be more careful since they are not doing themselves a favor by handing over their patients to their assistants without adequate supervision.
reply_text: Dear Mam, this sort of feedback is unwarranted especially since I have been cooperative from the moment you walked in. You had an extremely complicated cracked tooth issue which we not only successfully diagnosed but also treated successfully. As per your crown, we gave you a warranty crown which was fitted by my assistant only because you were not willing to wait for me. I had repeatedly told you that I was unavailable due to a death in the family. It is unfortunate that despite trying my level best to sort out your issue and even refunding your amount, you think it is befitting to malign my reputation. These portals unfortunately speak nothing of the time and effort that the doctor has put in to satisfy you. Wish there was a portal for us to place feedbacks on patients as well.

Rickey Kohli 
Canada
